official_title: To designate the United States bankruptcy courthouse located at 271 Cadman Plaza East, Brooklyn, New York, as the "Conrad Duberstein United States Bankruptcy Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the United States bankruptcy courthouse located at 271 Cadman Plaza East, Brooklyn, New York, as the Conrad Duberstein United States Bankruptcy Courthouse.
